name: Ouroboros (itch) (Sonatai)
description:
It's a psychological game about the five stages of grieve. In order to progress through the dungeon you need to solve a puzzle in each room. It's still in developement so keep an open eye for further updates if you like the game. Especially the dialogue and some of the assets will be changed to match the artstyle.

It was created by Jenny Gebauer and Daniel Nepp
